defaultText:
The final grade is issued based on the sum of points from the colloquium and tasks according to the dependency:
% points obtained         Grade
< 50% - 60% >                          3.0
( 60% - 70% >                          3.5
( 70% - 80% >                          4.0
( 80% - 90% >                          4.5
( 90% - 100% >                        5.0
